name: Mexuar Communications
tag_list: corraleta, click-to-talk, webphone, softphone, java, iax, dating, conference, social-network, crm
overview:
Mexuar Communications is a software development company specialising in Web & Softphone, Click-to-talk technology and bespoke communication applications. This technology bridges the Internet and Telecommunications across a wide range of businesses and services.

Mexuar’s Corraleta enables developers to create web based communication products for many different online application.

Corraleta takes users from a web page to a VoIP call within 10 seconds. These calls are pure IP from the web browser to a contact centre PBX and are free, irrespective of the location of the caller or contact centre.

As Corraleta can be customised there are many communication uses: Click to talk: for call centres, e-commerce and customer service sites CRM: integrate a dialler to receive and make calls from customer records Email: add a click to talk button in your emails Banners: embed a call function within an online banner advertisement Chat button: use in social and business network sites Dating: communicate privately, 1 to1, without disclosing your number Conference: access audio conferencing from your company web page

Corraleta is a tiny Java technology applet (125kb) which means there is no software to download when initiating a call. As Internet Explorer and Firefox is Java compliant calls can be made instantly whether using Windows, Mac or Linux operating systems. This contrastâ€™s with rival solutions that are flash based or use ActiveX and work only with Windows platforms and the Internet Explorer browser. Calls are registered by the PBX, in this case using Asterisk (IAX) providing VoIP calls to destinations World-wide.
